title: Matson (MATX) Shares Cross Above 200 DMA - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of Matson Inc (Symbol: MATX) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $36.55, changing hands as high as $37.87 per share. Matson Inc shares are currently trading up about 4.9% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of MATX shares, versus its 200 day moving average:     Looking at the chart above, MATX's low point in its 52 week range is $30.60 per share, with $42.155 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $37.61.
